Or at least get in touch...

Ok, so there is no real brewery. This is just a web development exercise project - sorry! Thanks for stopping by though. Building this project strengthened my HTML & CSS skill. Particularly, I was able to learn more about Sass syntax and project structure as well as practice responsive design techniques. Feel free to checkout my GitHub page to see more and/or reach out with any question / comments / inquiries. Thanks - have a good one!
